name: Moiré (dimikira)
description:
Down on your luck you suddenly find an employment opportunity under a charming young man. Will you be able to help him find his lost memories, or will you end up finding something else entirely? 🗝

Demo includes:

  • ~10k words (around an hour of gameplay)
  • 3 Love Interests 💙💗💛
  • 4 CGs

Finished game will have:

  • Way more words
  • 3 endings for each character 😈
  • Multiple outfits for each character  😜
  • A date episode with your fav
  • a cute little mouse! ...what?

special thanks to everyone who has supported me throughout this game making process you mean the world to me !!!!💐

(also when you finish the demo, fill out this survey!)

(or just leave a comment either is fine♡)
